com.king.frame.mvvmframe.base.lifecycle

接口 ApplicationLifecycle

  • 所有已知实现类:
    ApplicationDelegate

    public interface ApplicationLifecycle
    代理Application 的生命周期, 实现类见ApplicationDelegate
